name: Trial of the Tower God
description:
A great tower has risen from the Earth! And with it echoes a challenge.

“If you feel thyself worthy to ascend to godhood, face my trial.”

Help guide a small gladiator armed with only a buckler shield to the peak of this treacherous tower.

Your character's tool of choice, the unassuming buckler shield, provides a unique balance of both defense and offense.

Ricochet the small shield with style to dispatch enemies and clear rooms as you progress to the tower's highest point.

While unarmed, perform tactical dodge rolls to avoid the many hazards unleased by your foes.

The Imp:
Summoned beast of the underworld.
Small in stature, quick to overwhelm.

The Cyclops:
Children of the Tower God.
Powerful in magic, but vulnerable after its use.

The Satyr:
Nimble and ornery servants.
Steer clear of their forceful headbutts!

The Nymph:
Grudge holding nature spirits.
Attacks with terrible roots and vines.

Thank you for taking the time to read about, and potentially play,
Trial of the Tower God
We hope that it proves enjoyable, and would love to hear your feedback!

If you care to read more on this passion project and its future potential, feel free to check out the Development Log post and Comments below!
